4.48.text: These people are amongst the greatest quiz players in Britain.

10.04.text: Together, they make up the Eggheads -

11.88.text: arguably the most formidable quiz team in the country.

25.20.text: The show where a team of five quiz Challengers

27.36.text: pit their wits against possibly the greatest quiz team in Britain.

35.24.text: Good stuff. Taking on our awesome quiz champions today

39.52.text: Now, this of team of friends

41.44.text: all met at the Co-op Management College in the 1970s.

44.84.text: Despite losing touch after completing the course,

47.48.text: they were reunited two years ago via social media.

51.88.text: Hi, I'm Keith and I'm a business consultant.

54.48.text: Hi, I'm Julian and I'm a community volunteer.

68.72.text:
- Good to see you. 
- Thank you.

- Commiserations to our Co-operators.

1675.88.text: The Eggheads have done what comes naturally to them.

1679.92.text: This does mean you won't be going home with the £6,000.

1682.96.text: So the money rolls over to our next show.

1686.88.text: Who on earth will beat you?

1688.72.text: Join us next time to see if a new team of Challengers

1691.00.text: have the brains to defeat the brainboxes over here.
